testcase.name: Purchase successfull scenario
testcase.system-out: Given I want to go to automationpractice website............................passed And verify the mystore title................................................passed When I click on sign in.....................................................passed Then I should see the login page............................................passed When I enter "Minh" login credentials.......................................passed Then I should see the my account page.......................................passed When I choose the option women and choose tshirts...........................passed Then I should see the tshirts section.......................................passed When I choose medium size...................................................passed And I add the faded short sleeve tshirt to the cart.........................passed And I choose proceed to checkout on tshirts selection page..................passed Then I should see my order page.............................................passed When I choose proceed to checkout on order page.............................passed And I choose the payment method cheque......................................passed And I confirm my order......................................................passed Then I should see order confirmation page...................................passed And validate the payment amount.............................................passed
